Control Name: 1.9.8 Unused storage resources (e.g. unattached disks, old snapshots) are periodically cleaned up.
Control Statement: Unused storage resources can incur cost and it is a good idea to regularly perform cleanup to reduce spending.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.9 How do you manage storage and data costs for this workload?
